mapper.insert: insert into recipe_comment(recipe_id , mf_no , comment_content , parentCommentNo) values(#{recipe_id},#{mf_no},#{comment_content},#{parentCommentNo})
mapper.select: select * from recipe_comment where recipe_id=#{recipe_id} and deleted != 1 order by comment_no desc
mapper.update: update board_comment set recommend_count = recommend_count - 1 where commentNo=#{commentNo} and recommend_count > 0
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_comment where boardNo = #{boardNo} and deleted = 0

SELECT c.commentNo , c.commentWriter , c.commentContent , c.userNo , c.commentCreatedTime , c.parentCommentNo , c.recommend_count , CASE WHEN cr.mf_no IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS recommended FROM board_comment c LEFT JOIN comment_recommend cr ON c.commentNo = cr.commentNo AND cr.mf_no = #{mf_no} WHERE c.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND c.deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.commentCreatedTime DESC
mapper.update: update board_comment set recommend_notify_step = recommend_notify_step +50 where commentNo=#{commentNo}
